Organizers.Name: Mohamed Faizal
Organizers.Description: Mohamed Faizal, Technology Specialist. Microsoft. High achieving, persuasive, adaptable & innovative problem solver with 20 years of experience with MNCs like Microsoft, Cognizant, Dimension Data & NCS. Specialist in consultative selling, pre-sales, alliances and partnership building.

Organizers.Name: Puneet Ghanshani
Organizers.Description: Puneet, Senior Architect at Microsoft, is responsible for engaging with Microsoft's customers for Presales/Delivery and providing thought and technical leadership to improve their technology landscape using Artificial Intelligence tools/frameworks on Azure and streamline their DevOps processes. He has spoken in over 30 conferences on topics related to .NET and Azure, authored over 25 articles in international journals, a book on advanced C to his name, and has contributed to many open source projects on GitHub. Prior to joining Microsoft, he was also MVP on Microsoft Azure and .NET technologies.

Organizers.Name: Senthamil Selvan
Organizers.Description: Microsoft Windows Dev MVP. Have experience in developing apps for windows platform. Developed several UWP apps and currently working on HoloLens apps.

Speaker.Name: Wely Lau

He currently works as Technology Specialist on Azure Application Development Platform for Microsoft Asia Pacific.Before joining Microsoft, he was 5 years Azure MVP and was the first Azure MVP in Southeast Asia.

His interest lies in Cyber Security, Mobile Apps and .Net Technologies, in his free time he likes to write on Quora and has been featured as 'Most Viewed Writer' for Xamarin.

Speaker.Name: Puneet Ghanshani
Speaker.Description: Puneet, Senior Architect at Microsoft, is responsible for engaging with Microsoft's customers for Presales/Delivery and providing thought and technical leadership to improve their technology landscape using Artificial Intelligence tools/frameworks on Azure and streamline their DevOps processes. He has spoken in over 30 conferences on topics related to .NET and Azure, authored over 25 articles in international journals, a book on advanced C to his name, and has contributed to many open source projects on GitHub. Prior to joining Microsoft, he was also MVP on Microsoft Azure and .NET technologies.

Speaker.Name: Saranya Sriram
Speaker.Description: Saranya is a Cloud Solution Architect Lead in APAC Partner’s organization at Microsoft, leading a team of CSAs to help Partners migration applications and solutions into Azure platform. Saranya, herself is a technical enthusiast and hands on various parts of Application innovation and development. She is  a regular speaker at Microsoft Summits, keynote speaker demos, and speakers at Tech Summit, as well as a variety of 3rd party cloud events and conferences, specifically she has been presenting in Global Azure Bootcamp consecutively for 5 years now.

Speaker.Name: Thuan Nguyen
Speaker.Description: Thuan is a Microsoft MVP since 2011 with nearly 10 years  experiences extensively on Microsoft stack. Thuan is passionate about software product and security engineering on cloud. He is now focusing on developing Practical Transformation Framework and Methodology for Datacenter, Large-scale and Mass Migration to Microsoft Azure

Speaker.Name: Shirley Wang
Speaker.Description: Shirley Wang is a Principal PM Manager working on Azure Data Factory.  Having been part of Microsoft Data Group for the last 16 years, Shirley has worked on SQL Server performance, SQL upgrade and migration tooling, Azure SQL Data Sync, and now ADF, a fully-managed data integration service in Azure.

Sessions.Title: Building real world Blockchain applications on Azure

Speaker.Name: Ujjwal Kumar
Speaker.Description: Ujjwal Kumar is a Principal Technical Evangelist at Microsoft's Commercial Software Engineering (CSE) group based out of Singapore. He is a digital transformation ninja and works on system of intelligence (A.I., Blockchain, Bots, Cloud, IoT) with customers and partners to enable them realize their potential through architecture design and code development.

Sessions.Title:
Hands On Lab - Blockchain: Lab Pre-requisite:

1. Azure subscription with access rights to create resources
2. Developers should have the following on their machines:
3. Visual Studio Code - https://code.visualstudio.com/ This tool is free for Windows/Mac/Linux
4. Solidity extension for VS Code: https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=JuanBlanco.solidity
5. Chrome browser / Firefox Browser and MetaMask extension : https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/metamask/nkbihfbeogaeaoehlefnkodbefgpgknn?hl=en
6. Postman: https://www.getpostman.com/
7. Link for API dev tools: Azure SDK for .Net and Node https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/downloads/
